subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Retief Goosen and Joe Durant shared the lead after the first round of the Tour Championship on Thursday after each shot two-under-par 68 in winds that reached 25 miles an hour.
snippet: Retief Goosen and Joe Durant shared the lead after the first round of the Tour Championship on Thursday after each shot two-under-par 68 in winds that reached 25 miles an hour.
